DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine combination naltrexone SR fluoxetine effective treating symptom obsessive-compulsive disorder ( OCD ) either fluoxetine alone naltrexone SR alone .
DOC.brief_title: Naltrexone SR Fluoxetine Combination Therapy Subjects With Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder
DOC.criteria: Male female subject , 18 60 year age ( inclusive ) Outpatients current diagnosis OCD receive previous therapy Negative serum pregnancy test screen woman childbearing potential If woman childbearing potential , must agree use acceptable effective form contraception No clinically significant abnormality electrocardiogram ( ECG ) No clinically significant laboratory abnormality screen Negative urine drug screen Must consider reliable possess level understanding enables subject provide write informed consent comply protocol procedure schedule Diagnosis substance dependence Diagnosis substance abuse ( except nicotine caffeine ) Serious unstable medical illness Lifetime history bipolar disorder , schizophrenia psychosis , bulimia , anorexia nervosa , Pervasive Developmental Disorder ( PDD ) , Asperger 's Syndrome presence antisocial borderline personality disorder Diagnosis tic disorder Tourette 's Syndrome Subjects diagnose impulse control disorder Known sensitivity allergic reaction either naltrexone fluoxetine Any condition opinion investigator Sponsor make subject unsuitable inclusion study Immediate family investigator , study personnel Sponsor representative
